wahanaya gana saka sithu polis niladharihu wahanaya aasanyata gos nawathwana lesa riyaduruta danwa atha.riyaduru enjima nawathwimedi bhawitha kara thibu yathura desa polis niladhariyaku bala sita thibe.eya malakada kana lada aluth wahanayakata nogalapena yathurak bawa therumgena prashna kirimedi maharagama pradeshaye wahana kuliyata dena sthanayakin mema wahanaya sorakam kara gena pamini bawa sakakaruwan pawasa atha.mita pera melesa sorakam karana lada wahanayak sambandhawa adhikaranaye wibhaga wana naduwak sandaha nithignya gasthu gewimata me wahanaya sorakam kara alewi kirimata sudanam wu bawa ema sakakaruwan wadiduratath kiya atha.kottasa polis adhikari jayantha liyanage migamuwa sahakara polis adhikari anura premashantha yana niladharinge upades pita migamu mulasthana polisiye sthanadhipathi pradhana polis parikshaka gamini hallawa mahathage adhikshanaya yatathe kottasa aparadha wimarshana anshaye sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka priyadarshana, polis sarayan (63188) mohomad rawup, polis kosthapalwaru wana (41386) ruwan, (82574) ajith yana kandayama aparadhakaruwan athadanguwata ganime meheyuma sandaha idiripath wuha..
